channel.title: Rs-remake - Remake of 2007 - Old school forever
channel.description:
[center]Rs-remake Website: http://rs-remake.com/title.html Uptime: 100% 8GB RAM[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ac5vkm.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][size=12pt]Combat[/size] *All the normal features *Some degradable equipment *Weapon Poisoning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][size=12pt]Magic[/size] *Ancients and Normals *Working Multi Barrage *Correct hits and anims
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img][size=12pt] Ranged[/size] *Working throwing knifes *Normal Bows and Arrows
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][size=12pt]Prayer[/size] *Burying *Working Altars *All prayers work *Draining at JAD
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][size=12pt]Mining and Woodcutting[/size] *Emptying Rocks and tree stumps *Examine / Prospect All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][size=12pt]Quests[/size] Free: *Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too) *Horror from the deep *Lost City *Romeo & Juliet *Rune Mysteries (old version) *The Mage's Challenge *Dragon Slayer *Cook's assistant *Witch's Potion [b]Premium[/b] (1 time 5 dollars): *Gertrude's Cat *Champions' Challenge
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][size=12pt]Music and sounds[/size] *Working Sounds *Music in areas (not with music tab)
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][size=12pt]Random events[/size] *Genie *Tree Spirit *Old man *Rock Golem *Tree turning in monster tree
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img][size=12pt]Minigames[/size] *Duel Arena *Castle Wars *Fight Caves *Barrows *Pest Control *Tzhaar Caves
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] *Working Clue Scrolls --> Maps, text. --> you get a zamorak or saradomin wizard spawn. *A lot of working trapdoors *Working Boats
[sub][b]List of bugs we fixed (more will be added): green=done orange=we are working on this red=not started[/b]
-Fixed the climb stairs system to spawn the added objects like they should when you change height level. -The Duel with everywhere system has now been customised so that you can never in any circumstances lose your items because of it. -Duel arena get out in stake glitch -Random Noclip bug -Removed text from npcs that would dc you. -Get stuck at agaility course -Dc on thieving -Removed click sound ( bird ) -Music works (not with tab) -All sounds work -Removed the 2 hour auto updates -A better saving system
-Following: Needs fixes -Firemaking : You can't make 2 fires on top of eachother (1 already made will go away) but it does not check for objects yet and you don't move. -Castle wars nulpointer bug: 90% -Still working on some text that would dc you. -You can not light logs in the bank
-Famous magic bug : Starting on this -Random multi hit and npc unattackable -Making Hardleather does not work yet
Adding...
New content: -H.A.M. -Added the lumbridge bank to the top of the roof and placed portals there -Added a lot of extra drops -Changed the price database to match the old rs database Adding...
There is probably a lot more of things that I have been adding I can't directly think of since I have been working on this a long time.
For anyone who is wondering this project was once called artegoworld [/sub]
Screenshots [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ccwfaw.gif[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2jfgebo.png[/img]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/ae2q6e.png[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2vacfoh.gif[/img]
[img]http://i31.tinypic.com/eq4c21.png[/img]

item.title: Rs-remake - Remake of 2007 - Old school forever
item.dc:creator: @Enderbro Enderbro
item.description:
@Enderbro wrote:

pokemonn:

i loled at the website. the homepage is not complete and the forums are not the same, this hence forth can not be called a remake

We are calling it a remake because the things we were remaking were things we liked, for example “Duel with” feature.
A new website/Forums/Hi-scores are being worked on, they should be here soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs-remake - Remake of 2007 - Old school forever
item.dc:creator: @Enderbro Enderbro
item.description:
@Enderbro wrote:

[center]Rs-remake
Website: http://rs-remake.com/title.html
Uptime: 100% 8GB RAM[/center]

[center]

ac5vkm.png728×90
[/center]

[size=12pt]Combat[/size]
*All the normal features
*Some degradable equipment
*Weapon Poisoning

[size=12pt]Magic[/size]
*Ancients and Normals
*Working Multi Barrage
*Correct hits and anims

[size=12pt] Ranged[/size]
*Working throwing knifes
*Normal Bows and Arrows

[size=12pt]Prayer[/size]
*Burying
*Working Altars
*All prayers work
*Draining at JAD

[size=12pt]Mining and Woodcutting[/size]
*Emptying Rocks and tree stumps
*Examine / Prospect
All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list.

[size=12pt]Quests[/size]
Free:
*Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too)
*Horror from the deep
*Lost City
*Romeo & Juliet
*Rune Mysteries (old version)
*The Mage’s Challenge
*Dragon Slayer
*Cook’s assistant
*Witch’s Potion
Premium (1 time 5 dollars):
*Gertrude’s Cat
*Champions’ Challenge

[size=12pt]Music and sounds[/size]
*Working Sounds
*Music in areas (not with music tab)

[size=12pt]Random events[/size]
*Genie
*Tree Spirit
*Old man
*Rock Golem
*Tree turning in monster tree

[size=12pt]Minigames[/size]
*Duel Arena
*Castle Wars
*Fight Caves
*Barrows
*Pest Control
*Tzhaar Caves


*Working Clue Scrolls
–> Maps, text.
–> you get a zamorak or saradomin wizard spawn.
*A lot of working trapdoors
*Working Boats

[sub]List of bugs we fixed (more will be added):
green=done
orange=we are working on this
red=not started

-Fixed the climb stairs system to spawn the added objects like they should when you change height level.
-The Duel with everywhere system has now been customised so that you can never in any circumstances lose your items because of it.
-Duel arena get out in stake glitch
-Random Noclip bug
-Removed text from npcs that would dc you.
-Get stuck at agaility course
-Dc on thieving
-Removed click sound ( bird )
-Music works (not with tab)
-All sounds work
-Removed the 2 hour auto updates
-A better saving system

-Following: Needs fixes
-Firemaking : You can’t make 2 fires on top of eachother (1 already made will go away) but it does not check for objects yet and you don’t move.
-Castle wars nulpointer bug: 90%
-Still working on some text that would dc you.
-You can not light logs in the bank

-Famous magic bug : Starting on this
-Random multi hit and npc unattackable
-Making Hardleather does not work yet

Adding…

New content:
-H.A.M.
-Added the lumbridge bank to the top of the roof and placed portals there
-Added a lot of extra drops
-Changed the price database to match the old rs database
Adding…

There is probably a lot more of things that I have been adding I can’t directly think of since I have been working on this a long time.

For anyone who is wondering this project was once called artegoworld
[/sub]

Screenshots

Read full topic
item.source: Rs-remake - Remake of 2007 - Old school forever
